title: LegenVD
description:
Magic the Gathering strategy videos with a focus on the digital Magic Arena.
This channel is supported by its fans on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: The most powerful Planeswalker in Magic.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a blue/white artifact control deck, featuring Urza, Lord Protector as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro
02:33 - Deck Tech
07:57 - vs Tatyova, Benthic Druid
13:15 - vs Helga, Skittish Seer
20:22 - vs Thalia and The Gitrog Monster
31:49 - vs Maha, Its Feathers Night
37:34 - vs Baral and Kari Zev
42:18 - vs Tiamat

Decklist: 
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/urza-planeswalker-meld-brawl

"Movement Proposition" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
